p.codeblock: Future<void> enableContentInspectEx( {required bool enabled, required ContentInspectConfig config, required RtcConnection connection});
public abstract int EnableContentInspectEx(bool enabled, ContentInspectConfig config, RtcConnection connection);

section.p: This method allows capturing and uploading snapshots for multiple video streams. After enabling local snapshot upload, the SDK captures and uploads snapshots of the video sent by the local user based on the module type and frequency you set in . After capturing, the Agora server sends a callback notification to your server via HTTPS request and uploads all snapshots to the third-party cloud storage you specify.

This method allows capturing and uploading snapshots of multiple video streams. After local snapshot upload is enabled, the SDK captures and uploads snapshots of the video sent by the local user based on the module type and frequency you set in . Once the snapshot is complete, the Agora server sends a callback notification to your server via HTTPS and uploads all snapshots to your specified third-party cloud storage.

This method can take and upload snapshots for multiple video streams. After enabling local snapshot upload, the SDK takes and uploads snapshots of the video sent by the local user based on the module type and frequency set in . After the snapshot is completed, the Agora server sends a callback notification to your server via HTTPS request and uploads all snapshots to your specified third-party cloud storage.

This method allows you to capture and upload snapshots from multiple video streams. After enabling local snapshot upload, the SDK captures and uploads snapshots of the local user's video based on the module type and frequency you set in . Once the snapshots are captured, Agora's server sends a callback notification to your server via an HTTPS request and uploads all snapshots to your designated third-party cloud storage.
section.note: Before calling this method, make sure you have [contacted technical support](https://ticket.shengwang.cn/) to enable the local snapshot upload service.
Before calling this method, make sure you have [contacted technical support](https://ticket.shengwang.cn/) to enable the local snapshot upload service.
Before calling this method, please [contact technical support](https://ticket.shengwang.cn/) to enable the local snapshot upload service.
Before calling this method, make sure you have [contacted technical support](https://ticket.shengwang.cn/) to enable the local snapshot upload service.

section.title: Timing
section.p: You can call this method either before or after joining a channel.
Can be called before or after joining a channel.
Can be called before or after joining a channel.
You can call this method before or after joining a channel.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
